explains: n. 分子，摩尔；少量，一点儿；微小颗粒，微粒
wordGroup: molecule biology 分子生物学；分子学
polar molecule 极性有极分子

sentences.en: The DNA molecule is compounded from many smaller molecules.
sentences.cn: 脱氧核糖核酸分子是由许多更小的分子组成的。

sentences.en: A molecule of water consists of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 水分子由两个氢原子和一个氧原子构成。

sentences.en: Two atoms of hydrogen combine with one atom of oxygen to form a molecule of water.
sentences.cn: 两个氢原子和一个氧原子结合组成一个水分子。
